settings.question: What is CBD?
settings.answer: Cannabidiol (CBD) is one of over 100 molecules produced by the Cannabis plant, called cannabinoids. Of the cannabinoids, CBD is the most abundant making up 40% of the plant’s extract. When ingested, it acts as a plant supplement for the body’s chemical needs and can provide many health benefits.
